title: Check Financial Aid Award Status
description: A student is calling to see if their financial aid package for the next academic year has been determined.

tasks.description: Identify the student and retrieve their financial aid profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the student's record.

tasks.description: Check the status of their financial aid application and award.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the financial aid package has been awarded and is ready for review.

tasks.description: Inform the student that their award letter is available on the student portal and explain the components (grants, loans).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the award status and guides the student to the portal.
